channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: STREET LIGHT OUT O/S between No 21 &23, 29th January
item.description:
Resident reporting the street light o/s no 21 & 23 is out it has been out for a few days and at night time it is very dark and difficult to get off the drive in the dark. Please could someone look into this asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anthony Road, East Wickham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes in one area covering most of the road, 29th January
item.description:
Hidden Potholes. Hazardous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bury Green Road, Broxbourne

item.title: All 3 drains around are blocked, filled with mud, 29th January
item.description:
During rainy days, it floods making it dangerous for passing traffic and folks waiting to cross towards the Elmers End station/Tesco. It is been like this for several months. The fencing is broken too - the area doesn’t seem to have been maintained.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vans parked. Evrey where, 29th January
item.description:
The try to organise the roads to self by telling people to drive to red light at the Park everywhere why not Park? Them in the side streets is a big traffic jam there for no reason.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London

item.title: The CEDARHURST sign was taken away by a RINEY worker. There was nothing wrong with the sign, it is the post that is damaged., 29th January
item.description:
The sign was taken away early December 2025 & it hasn’t been replaced yet. Please sort this issue as we need a Cedarhurst sign to identify the properties please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Elstree Hill, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags dumped outside charity shop., 29th January
item.description:
Bags dumped outside charity shop while closed. Was left blocking our doors under a fly tipping is illegal sign so i had to move to the side. There are council cctv cameras pointing at the door.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Trafalgar Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 29th January
item.description:
Residents reported several broken and abandoned bins to the council a week ago at Sutherland Square, but no action has been taken. As a result, the area has become a fly-tipping point, and the broken bins are now attracting builders’ waste and other items.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sutherland Square, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
